clue: Queer conjurer to cast about chaotically
explanation: RUM (odd, peculiar, queer) MAGE (conjurer) to "cast about chaotically" (RUMMAGE).
hints: We're looking for (possibly old-fashioned) words meaning "queer" (peculiar) and "conjurer" (sorcerer or wizard).
To cast about is to search for something. Our definition is "cast about chaotically".
